EmailTemplate.description: Push email sent to the Market Company user if 15 days after the estimated delivery date the Experience monitoring checklist is not completed.
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify to send the Purchase Order
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Finish the Experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName},
Normally our Friend {!PJ_ByFor_Experience_Client_Full_Name__c} has received our product the {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Client_reception_date__c} . Please connect on the application and fill the effective Reception Date: Link
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
